en.description: Primed Cleanse Corpus is the Primed version of the Cleanse Corpus mod, which increases the damage of shotguns against Corpus. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

ru.description: Primed Cleanse Corpus is the Primed version of the Cleanse Corpus mod, which increases the damage of shotguns against Corpus. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

ko.description: Primed Cleanse Corpus is the Primed version of the Cleanse Corpus mod, which increases the damage of shotguns against Corpus. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.
